notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: E.M.S., E.M.-B., J.A.M.-G. designed the concept, conducted the search, wrote the majority of the paper and managed the authors; D.L.-R., M.S-G., G.C.-C., G.B.-C., A.M.-G., M.A.V-V wrote key sections of the paper; E.M.-S., E.M.-B., J.A.M.-G., R.I.A.-G. and J.A.I.-V. wrote sections and managed the reference list.
